item.title: BASSWOMAN Cool White Design for Female Bassists Mug by guitarstreams
item.description: A cool design for women who play the bass showing the word BASSWOMAN in all capital letters in narrow, slender font. Show your love for the coolest musical instrument and keep the rhythm going!

item.title: EADG For Those About To Slap - Bass Player Hard Rock Design
item.description: A cool design for bass players who enjoy hard rock and heavy metal music and mostly play their instrument in standard E tuning. / This bassist design shows the letters E, A, D and G in a hard rock style font separated by a bass icon and the text “FOR THOSE ABOUT TO SLAP” in a serif font… • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. item.title: Soprano Alto Tenor Bass - Bassist Design White/Red
item.description: Soprano, Alto, Tenor, and Bass are voice types in music. More importantly though, the Bass is also a string instrument, an especially cool one as all bassists will confirm. / This design is for bass players who want to show the instrument they love in a funny way. It consists of the 4 voice types with checkboxes to the left and BASS marked with a red cross made up of 2 bass guitars. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, phone cases, home decor, and more.
